snippet.title: Onirism "Welcome to Crearia" Trailer (Indie game)
snippet.description:
Onirism is an action/adventure game inspired by the classic of the genre. Follow Carol in her adventure trough Crearia to find her stolen plushie!

Follow us on social medias : 
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Onirismthegame/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/OnirismThegame/

Try the FREE DEMO yourself ! 
https://onirism.crimson-tales.com/
https://gamejolt.com/games/Onirism/310178

#trailer #IndieWorld #indiegame
